}}'''Thorn''' is the fifteenth track of the [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]-themed album [[Nightfall in Middle-Earth]] by [[Blind Guardian]]. The song tells of the son of [[Maeglin]], the son of [[Eöl]]. Maeglin reflects on his place in the world and his decision to betray the location of the hidden city [[Gondolin]] to [[Morgoth]].<ref>{{S|23}}</ref>
